Class JsonApiResource

Object
JsonApiResource
All Implemented Interfaces:
ResourceContext
Direct Known Subclasses:
CertificateRequestResource, EventStoreResource, ServerResource, ServiceResource, SubjectResource
@Produces("text/html;qs=1,application/vnd.api+json;qs=0.5,application/json;qs=0.4,application/yaml;qs=0.3") public abstract class JsonApiResource extends Object implements ResourceContext
